SLSC EDS Addon - Properties

This SLSC EDS Addon provides the ability to monitor and communicate with SLSC Module inside a SLSC Chassis. The Properties Parameters are used to read and write the available properties on your SLSC Module through the this Addon.

What do you want to do?

Make a connection to the Properties Channels

Connect to the Property channel if you want to change the value of the property. The SLSC EDS will apply the change on a value change of the channel. No additional changes should be applied afterwards. If several values are changed together, only one "apply" should be performed. If the value is out of bounds or a non-critical error happen, then the value will not be applied and the error will be reported on "SLSC Mod Error Code". Apply a correct value again to change the property correctly. Use "SLSC Mod Clear Error" to acknoledge the generated error and clear the reported value.
